title: The Mysterious Laugh
body: It is Helmet Bro coming back from the grave... dun dunnn dunnnn!!!

replies.body: This one is for my fellow helmet brother.
What could it beeeeeeee...........dun dun dunnnnn!

I don't think so. At first I thought it might be Dazza or Bazza but whatever it is it sounds like it's underwater, so I really doubt it's them. Best guess, it's a "teaser" for a new champion or epic jungle monster that lives (or can breathe) underwater.
Given the new video "[The River King](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9RM4HwwoKs&feature=youtu.be)" it seems I was right.
I thought it was kind of like an undead champion the first time i heard it, but then i listened to it again and it did seem a bit underwater-ish because of the bubbles effect?
I started league in 2012 so I might have missed this, who is helmet bro?

He's an unnamed soldier that dies in a lot of artwork. The community gave this character a name "Helmet Bro"!

You can find him in the [Vel'Koz teaser](https://youtu.be/fyb2KC-q7ls) and a few of the new splash arts ( Helmet in new Kog'maw splash, looking through his helmet at [Sion stomping on him in login/splash](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-dnO77O5_U0), a few getting eaten in the new Cho'gath splash )

The community even came up with cool [concepts ](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4303058&page=1#post45329813)for what he would actually do if he was in game!

added image of helmet bro!

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/u5914rhwDoQ/maxresdefault.jpg

{{summoner:7}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:12}}
He is the Soldier that is killed in a lot of champion's splash arts.
